project.Title: Picaroon (Class Mod)
project.ItemDescription:
[h1]PICAROON V1.4[/h1]
*NEW! ChineseS Translation by 会喊666的咸鱼干
[list] The "sole-survivor" from an eldritch attack on a schooner off the coast near the Hamlet, the Picaroon is an agile gun-toting treasure-hunting pirate. She wields trusty pistols but in battle can also throw Toxic and Shredding Bombs. She can also disrupt enemy formations by firing a large, powerful Cannon. The Cannon can only be used sparingly and needs time to reload. She misses her former shipmates, will she find her redemption, or join her crew? [/list]
[img]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/48689375483_ac813689f8_z.jpg[/img] Full size: [url=https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/48689375483_ac81a85ded_o.jpg[b]Click here[/url]
[img]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/48692250011_ff0f425bd3_o.gif[/img][img]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/48692422772_6bb99be44f_o.gif[/img][img]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/48691909573_f806402ec7_o.gif[/img]
[h1]Roles[/h1] [list] Damage, Stun, Shuffler, Low Blight, Low Stress Healer, Riposte, Force guard, Treasure Hunter. A true dancer, nearly all of her skills include movement, so consider that in party formations. Bonuses against Marked. Prefers Ranks 1-2-3. [/list] [img]https://jubilee-live.flickr.com/65535/48722225863_a6d68a72a8_o.gif[/img]
[h1]Combat Skills[/h1]
[img]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/48691834553_a5255d3264_b.jpg[/img] [list] [*][b]Noxious Bomb:[/b] Low damage. Targets 3+4. Chance for low blight and to lower blight resist. [*][b]Tumultuous Cannon:[/b] Medium damage. Targets 1+2. Chance to Stun and Shuffle. Cannon's shockwave slightly lowers party Stun Resist. 2-Round Cooldown. Move back 2. [*][b]Shredding Bomb:[/b] Medium-high damage Bomb against one target. Bypass guard. Bypass protection. Move foward 1. [*][b]Dancing Shot:[/b] High damage against one target. Move back 1. [*][b]Piercing Volley:[/b] Medium-high damage. Bonus against Marked. Move back 1. From 321 can target 1,2, or 3. Chance to lower enemy protection. [*][b]Prurient Kiss:[/b] Force another party member to guard Picaroon. Medium stress heal. Target receives +Dodge -Healing Received. Move foward 1. [*][b]For The Sunken:[/b] Self target. Activates Riposte. Low stress heal. +CRIT -SPD. Move foward 2. [/list]
[h1]Camping Skills[/h1]
[img]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/48692176281_743134c713_b.jpg[/img] The Picaroon can call on her sailing experience to aid the party with 7 unique camping skills. [list] [*][b]Clean the Guns:[/b] +6 ACC, +20% Damage, +4 SPD on self for 5 battles. COST 4 [*][b]Scurvy Ward:[/b] Self only: Cure 1 Disease OR increase Disease Resist for 20% for 4 battles. COST 2 [*][b]X Marks the Spot:[/b] Dig for buried treasure. COST 2 [*][b]Night of Gambling:[/b] Party: +9 or -9 stress AND +5 CRIT chance or -5 SPD for 5 battles. COST 3 [*][b]Sea Legs:[/b] +10% Move Resist +10 Stun Resist on self for 3 battles. COST 1 [*][b]Shark's Blood Extract:[/b] Blight damage +50% for 4 battles. (10% chance at +100% damage for 4 battles) COST 3 [*][b]Wayfinder:[/b] +10 scouting chance & -10 surpised chance 4 battles. COST 2 [/list]
[h1]Trinkets[/h1]
[img]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/48692192636_e09cbec4f9_o.jpg[/img] [list] [*][b]Seafarer's Spyglass[/b] [*][b]Marine Chronometer[/b] [*][b]Kracken's Hook[/b] [*][b]Treasure Map[/b] [*][b]Captain's Hat[/b] [*][b]Pilar's Head[/b], Collector Drop [*][b]Cursed Lantern[/b], CC set [*][b]Mate O'Donnell[/b], CC set [*][b]Mister Jack[/b], COM Trinket [*][b]Aged Painting[/b], Sunward Isles [/list]
[h1]Other[/h1] [list] [*]Custom Town Events [*]2 New Quirks [spoiler]Inspired Memoriam, Survivor's Guilt[/spoiler] [*]Pirate Treasure-Hunter: 1 New Gem Type [spoiler]If interacting with curios, chance to find [b]Dubloons[/b] which are sold at the end of the adventure. Full stack = 7,500 gold[/spoiler] [*]Picaroon brings her personal shovel. Provision mod +1 free shovel/+1 shovel stack [*]Six color variants [img]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/48692135913_7b2a907914_z.jpg[/img] [/list]
[h1]Support[/h1]
None of these are needed to play with Picaroon, but have combatibility; [list] [*] CC (trinkets) [*] COM (trinket) [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1779509342[b]Pets Trinkets + Monster Mod[/url] (has pet for Pica) [*] Districts (Yellow hand) [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1689234891[b]Sunward Isles[/url] (trinket) [/list]
[h1]Sub-mods/patches[/h1] [list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1854283434[b]Picaroon (Spider Patch)[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1863316811[b]Picaroon - small chest skin replacer-[/url] [/list] [h1]Languages[/h1] [list] [*]English [*]ChineseS Translation by 会喊666的咸鱼干 [*]Other languages show English strings [/list]
[h1]Nexus link for GoG-users:[/h1]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/darkestdungeon/mods/887?[b]Click here[/url]
[h1]Some technical tid-bits[/h1] [list] [*]Uses Musketeer (free DLC, not required for the mod) skeleton and animations for the character. [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/araylie/myworkshopfiles/[b]Araylie[/url] re-scaled the skeleton bigger, but there is no custom animations, everything is based on vanilla stuff, edited from there. Even tough she uses vanilla skeletons and animations, there is ATLAS-tweaks (number edits in text files) used to change the mold somewhat, I'll try to put up short tutorial of it in the future. [*]All the art is uniquelly drawn for Pica, outside some skill fx, and obvious stuff like icon borders and such. [*]Sounds are mix of vanilla, and Dem22s edits. [*][b]Optimized pngs = smaller size, lighter mod[/b]. All of the character art pngs are optimized, size reduction is over 70% smaller than with traditional png, with basically zero quality loss.
Crop from un-edited screenshot, from 4k gameplay, one of the pngs characters is optimized (70+% smaller file size), other isn't: [/list] [img]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/48692472321_e2f1ab48ac_m.jpg[/img] Full-size: [url=https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/48692472321_92649805e0_o.jpg[b]Click here[/url] [list] Non optimized pngs available at Nexus as option if you wish to use them instead, optional file, link above. If you do personal edits to the pngs, I suggest grabbing the non optimized ones from there, and editing those. [/list]
